detailedSolution:
The scale is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>1</mn>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext> inch</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>91.25</mn>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext> miles</mtext>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">1{\text{ inch}} = 91.25{\text{ miles}}</annotation></semantics></math>. The other borders would calculate as: eastern and western borders are 273.75 miles, and northern border is 365 miles.
